message: Looks like google had announce something during the last I/O conf: http://emuneee.com/2011/05/new-wysiwyg-ui-designer-in-android-dev-tools/
Hi guys! I'm new in Android development and I come from the iOS world where we use this great tool named "Interface builder" to design basics interfaces, link it to our code...
I'm looking for something similar to design Android Interfaces. I tried Droiddraw but it isn't realy how usefull as I want it to be. Which one do you use?

yes, your best bet is what google is iteratively releasing. I don't know interface builder, but I bet that android visual designer is quite inferior: you reach a point where you have to deal with the xml description of the interface. I'm more of a developer so no big deal, but I know that a designer maybe needs some better visual tool...
